"Special Training: Episode 4":
"This is an exercise VR Training
quest. Aim for the final area
within the time limit.
This will put you through various
events encountered by ARKS, including
the events that occured on Earth.
Plan your party's abilities carefully.
――――――――――――――――――――
Time Limit: 15 minutes
Maximum damage cap/999999"
"We'll start the special training! The goal of this training session is to complete each area within the time limit."
"I personally created this VR exercise! The difficulty is much stronger compared to the others, so please watch yourselves!"
"So persevere and aim for a perfect finish!"
